page.title: 03INDUSTRY WOLSTANTON.
page.content: Wolstanton Colliery consists of 4 collieries,and is the deepest in Britain.Wolstanton produces coal from a mechanised face in the Cockshed seam at 12,one of the deepest in the country.Output from the mine is sold mainly as power station,and domestic fuel.Methane is extracted from the workings,and used for firing the space heating plant.The output is 394,807 tonnes,and the number of men on the book is 787.In 1983 miners at Wolstanton voted to accept a propasal to reduce the manpower of the pit by about 300.Those over 55 accepted voluntary redundancy,the rest were transfered to other pits.
